sentence.Network_en: Today, as usual, he was wearing a three-piece suit.

sentence.Network_en: A man's three - piece suit includes a jacket, trousers, and a waistcoat.
sentence.Network_cn: 男人的三 件套 服装包括上衣 、 长裤和背心.

sentence.Network_en: A three piece suite has two chairs and a sofa.
sentence.Network_cn: 三件一套的家俱有两把椅子和一个沙发.

entry.tran: (衣服)三件套的(通常包括男式上衣、马甲和裤子)
entry.def: A three-piece suit is a set of three pieces of matching clothing, usually a man's jacket, waistcoat, and trousers.
A three-piece suite is a sofa and two matching armchairs.

means.word_mean: 1. (of clothing) made in or consisting of three parts or pieces;

sentences.sentence: "the standard three-piece business suit; jacket and trousers and vest"
